name: G.I. Jane
tagline: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

name: Fat Albert
tagline: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.

name: Malcolm X
tagline: James Earl Jones narrates this fascinating and moving documentary about the life of the assassinated black leader through various sources.

name: The Land Before Time
tagline: Five orphan dinosaurs travel the ruins of their world, while grieving the loss of their families and banding together to face the odds of survival.

name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
tagline: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

name: Sinister
tagline: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm home movies films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

name: Kick-Ass
tagline: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

name: Nim's Island
tagline: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

name: The Natural
tagline: An unknown comes out of seemingly nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

name: Wayne's World 2
tagline: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

name: The Jungle Book 2
tagline: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

name: When a Stranger Calls
tagline: During an otherwise routine babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

name: Premonition
tagline: Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.

name: Big Fat Liar

production.name: Mediastream Zweite Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG

tagline: After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.

name: The Skeleton Key
tagline: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

name: Secret Window
tagline: A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for "justice."

name: Alien: Resurrection
tagline: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/Alien hybrid clone who must continue her war against the Aliens.

name: Dan in Real Life
tagline: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.

name: New Jack City
tagline: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

name: The Rundown
tagline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

name: The Other Woman
tagline: After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been cheating on. And when yet another affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot mutual revenge on the three-timing SOB.

name: Precious
tagline: In New York City's Harlem circa 1987, an overweight, abused, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

name: Look Who's Talking Too
tagline: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

name: An American Tail
tagline: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

name: Volcano
tagline: A volcano erupts in downtown L.A., threatening to destroy the city.

name: The Kingdom
tagline: A team of U.S. government agents is sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

name: Kingdom of Heaven
tagline: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

name: Munich
tagline: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.

name: Savages
tagline: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: Agent Cody Banks
tagline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

name: Hostel
tagline: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

name: Nanny McPhee
tagline: Emma Thompson stars as a governess who uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

name: Killers
tagline: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

name: Halloween
tagline: A psychotic murderer institutionalized since childhood for the murder of his sister, escapes and stalks a bookish teenage girl and her friends while his doctor chases him through the streets.

name: Silent Hill
tagline: A woman goes in search for her daughter, within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill. Based on the video game.

name: Shooter
tagline: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.

name: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
tagline: Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.

name: Goodfellas
tagline: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

name: The River Wild
tagline: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
tagline: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads with the help of a KGB agent whose lover he killed.

name: Dude, Where's My Car?
tagline: Two potheads wake up from a night of partying and can't remember where they parked their car.

name: The Rocketeer
tagline: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

name: Colors
tagline: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

name: The Brady Bunch Movie
tagline: The original '70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

name: Phone Booth
tagline: Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.

name: Final Destination 2
tagline: When Kimberly has a violent premonition of a highway pileup she blocks the freeway, keeping a few others meant to die, safe...Or are they? The survivors mysteriously start dying and it's up to Kimberly to stop it before she's next.

name: Arthur Christmas
tagline: On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santa's youngest son looks to use his father's high-tech operation for an urgent mission.

name: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
tagline: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than its advertisements, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

name: Boogeyman
tagline: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.

name: Full Metal Jacket
tagline: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the U.S.-Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

name: Romeo + Juliet
tagline: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

name: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
tagline: The dying words of a thief spark a madcap cross-country rush to find some treasure.

name: Malice
tagline: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches infants, Andy's a college professor. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.

name: Made of Honor
tagline: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

name: Gangster Squad
tagline: Los Angeles, 1949: A secret crew of police officers led by two determined sergeants work together in an effort to take down the ruthless mob king Mickey Cohen who runs the city.

name: Deep Sea
tagline: A 3-D digital exploration of the ocean's depths and its creatures.

name: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
Walking Tall
tagline: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

name: The Full Monty
tagline: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

name: The Rainmaker
tagline: An idealistic young lawyer and his cynical partner take on a powerful law firm representing a corrupt insurance company.

name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
tagline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

name: Manhattan

production.name: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions

tagline: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

name: RoboCop 2
tagline: A corrupt businesswoman seeks to disable Robocop in favor of her own model of cyborg.

name: Saw 3D: The Final Chapter
tagline: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

name: College Road Trip
tagline: When an overachieving high school student decides to travel around the country to choose the perfect college, her overprotective cop father also decides to accompany her in order to keep her on the straight and narrow.

name: The Tigger Movie
tagline: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
tagline: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out and find them.

name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
tagline: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

name: Medicine Man
tagline: The movie speaks to the value of preserving the rain forest for the preservation of our diversity of life. Gorgeous scenery! It is worth watching just for it's pure beauty.

name: In Good Company
tagline: A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.

name: Thelma & Louise
tagline: An Arkansas waitress and a housewife shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

name: The Legend of Zorro
tagline: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) -- and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) -- to take action.

name: Bean
tagline: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

name: Here Comes the Boom
tagline: A high school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed-martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extra-curricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

name: Domestic Disturbance
tagline: A divorced father discovers that his 12-year-old son's new stepfather is not what he made himself out to be.

name: Zoolander
tagline: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

name: 28 Days Later...
tagline: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

name: Hall Pass
tagline: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

name: Frequency
tagline: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

name: Made in America
tagline: A young black woman discovers that her father was a sperm donor, and if that weren't bad enough, he's white.

name: Cop Land
tagline: The sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community populated by New York City policemen slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

name: Cop Out
tagline: A comedy about a veteran NYPD cop whose rare baseball card is stolen. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his partner to track down the thief, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

name: Red Dawn
tagline: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

name: Let's Make Love
tagline: When billionaire Jean-Marc Clement learns that he is to be satirized in an off-Broadway revue, he passes himself off as an actor playing him in order to get closer to the beautiful star of the show, Amanda Dell.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
tagline: Survivors of undead serial killer Freddy Krueger - who stalks his victims in their dreams - learn to take control of their own dreams in order to fight back.

name: The Replacements
tagline: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

name: Young Guns
tagline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

name: The Artist
tagline: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.
